content: yo and knit to the first yo and k3tog the 2 yos and knit stitch from the next pair turn 4 on ws yo and purl to the first yo and p3 together through the back loops purl 2 yo and the following purl together turn repeat steps 3 and 4 until the last stitch on each end is consumed this is a wrong/purl side row on the knit side yo and there will be 32 stitches on the needle with a yarn over at each end turn the work around so that the wrong side of the heel is facing you and pull up on the right needle and slip the first yarn over to the right side on the top part of the sock then slip the next 32 stitches to the right needle this is necessary to get back to where the main color is attached to begin knitting with it again and slip the remaining yarn over to the left needle turn the work around pick up the main color and knit across the heel on the instep purl the yo together with the first purl stitch on the needle and continue with the pattern until the last purl stitch purl that together with the remaining yarn over continue to knit the sole stitches and knit in pattern on the instep foot work chart until foot is approximately 2 less than desired final length round toe decrease row on needle 1 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 on needle 2 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before end k2 decrease k1 on needle 1 k1 ssk knit to marker row 1 work decrease row row 12 knit around row 2-4 knit around row 13-16 repeat 11-12 twice more row 5 work decrease row row 17 decrease every row until 16 stitches remain - 8 on row 6 -7 knit around each needle graft stitches using the kitchener stitch row 8-10 repeat row 5-7 once more row 18 graft stitches using the kitchener stitch row 11 work decrease row 2 of 3 chart chart abbreviations © ellie putz 3 of 3
